net.tridentsdk.api.entity

Interface Entity

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Ageable, ArmorStand, Arrow, Bat, Blaze, Boat, Chicken, CommandMinecart, Cow, Creeper, Egg, EnderDragon, Enderman, Endermite, Enderpearl, Equippable, ExpBottle, ExperienceOrb, FallingBlock, Fireball, Firework, FishHook, FurnaceMinecart, Ghast, Guardian, Hanging, HopperMinecart, Horse, Hostile, InventoryHolder, Item, ItemFrame, LivingEntity, MagmaCube, MinecartBase, Mooshroom, Neutral, Ocelot, Painting, Peaceful, Pig, Player, Potion, PrimeTNT, Projectile, Rabbit, Saddleable, Sheep, Skeleton, Slime, SmallFireball, Snowball, SpawnerMinecart, Tameable, TNTMinecart, Villager, Wither, WitherSkull, Wolf, Zombie
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TridentArmorStand, TridentBat, TridentBlaze, TridentChicken, TridentCow, TridentCreeper, TridentEgg, TridentEnderDragon, TridentEnderman, TridentEndermite, TridentEntity, TridentFallingBlock, TridentGhast, TridentHorse, TridentInventoryHolder, TridentItemFrame, TridentLivingEntity, TridentMagmaCube, TridentMooshroom, TridentOcelot, TridentPainting, TridentPig, TridentPlayer, TridentPrimeTNT, TridentProjectile, TridentSnowball, TridentWitherSkull

    public interface Entity
    Represents the abstraction for a mob, player, animal, or other "object" that is not a block type

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyProperties(EntityProperties properties)
      Sets the properties of this entity to the specified properties
      void eject()
      Removes the mounted entity, if there are any
      java.lang.String getDisplayName()
      Gets the display name for the entity, used on inventories and deaths
      int getId()
      The identifier for this entity for runtime, see getUniqueId for a set id of the entity
      Location getLocation()
      The location of the entity with respect to the coordinate grid
      java.util.List<Entity> getNearbyEntities(double radius)
      Gets the entities that are close to this entity
      Entity getPassenger()
      Gets the entity that is riding this entity, if there is any
      EntityType getType()
      Gets the type of entity
      java.util.UUID getUniqueId()
      The unique id for the entity to the server
      Vector getVelocity()
      The direction and movement magnitude of the entity
      World getWorld()
      The world which the entity resides in
      boolean isNameVisible()
      Gets if the entity's display name visible
      boolean isOnGround()
      Checks if the entity is currently on the ground, or at least touching the ground
      boolean isSilent()
      Gets if the entity is silent (sounds)
      void remove()
      Removes the entity from the world and destroys it, freeing all memory associated with it
      void setDisplayName(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the entity's display name, effects inventories (if applicable) and death messages
      void setPassenger(Entity entity)
      Mounts the specified entity on this entity
      void setVelocity(Vector vector)
      Sets the entity's movement direction and speed to the magnitude of the vector
      void teleport(double x, double y, double z)
      Moves the entity to the specified location
      void teleport(Entity entity)
      Moves the current entity to the provided entity's location
      void teleport(Location location)
      Moves the entity to the coordinates specified by the location object passed in
      void tick()
      Perform entity management tasks in the 1/20 second server heartbeat

    • Method Detail

      • teleport

        void teleport(double x,
            double y,
            double z)
        Moves the entity to the specified location
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the location
        y - the y coordinate of the location
        z - the z coordinate of the location

      • teleport

        void teleport(Entity entity)
        Moves the current entity to the provided entity's location
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to move the current entity to

      • teleport

        void teleport(Location location)
        Moves the entity to the coordinates specified by the location object passed in
        Parameters:
        location - the location to move the entity to

      • getWorld

        World getWorld()
        The world which the entity resides in
        Returns:
        the world that contains the entity

      • getLocation

        Location getLocation()
        The location of the entity with respect to the coordinate grid
        Returns:
        the entity's location

      • getVelocity

        Vector getVelocity()
        The direction and movement magnitude of the entity
        Returns:
        the vector representing the entity's velocity

      • setVelocity

        void setVelocity(Vector vector)
        Sets the entity's movement direction and speed to the magnitude of the vector
        Parameters:
        vector - the vector to set the entity velocity to

      • tick

        void tick()
        Perform entity management tasks in the 1/20 second server heartbeat

      • isOnGround

        boolean isOnGround()
        Checks if the entity is currently on the ground, or at least touching the ground
        Returns:
        true if the entity touches the ground, false if it is in the air (such as if it was falling)

      • getNearbyEntities

        java.util.List<Entity> getNearbyEntities(double radius)
        Gets the entities that are close to this entity
        Parameters:
        radius - the spherical radius to look for entities around
        Returns:
        the collection of entities within the radius around the entity

      • getDisplayName

        java.lang.String getDisplayName()
        Gets the display name for the entity, used on inventories and deaths
        Returns:
        Display name

        void setDisplayName(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the entity's display name, effects inventories (if applicable) and death messages
        Parameters:
        name - Entity name

        boolean isNameVisible()
        Gets if the entity's display name visible
        Returns:
        if the entity's display name visible

        boolean isSilent()
        Gets if the entity is silent (sounds)
        Returns:
        if the entity is silent

      • getId

        int getId()
        The identifier for this entity for runtime, see getUniqueId for a set id of the entity
        Returns:
        the id to all entities on the server at runtime
        See Also:
        getUniqueId()

      • getUniqueId

        java.util.UUID getUniqueId()
        The unique id for the entity to the server
        Returns:
        The unique id for the entity

      • remove

        void remove()
        Removes the entity from the world and destroys it, freeing all memory associated with it

      • getPassenger

        Entity getPassenger()
        Gets the entity that is riding this entity, if there is any
        Returns:
        the entity that is riding, null if there are none

      • setPassenger

        void setPassenger(Entity entity)
        Mounts the specified entity on this entity
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to set passenger to this entity

      • eject

        void eject()
        Removes the mounted entity, if there are any

        EntityType getType()
        Gets the type of entity
        Returns:
        the entity type that is represented

        Sets the properties of this entity to the specified properties
